content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: DOMAIN
      operator: uses_valid_codelist_terms
      value: DOMAIN
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0001
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: DOMAIN name should use a SDTM-specified standard domain name and prefixes
  where applicable
Outcome:
  Message: DOMAIN Code is not a published DOMAIN Code in CDISC Controlled Terminology,
    confirm if domain is a custom domain
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0001
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Using SDTM-specified standard domain names and prefixes
                  where applicable.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Section: 3.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: DOMAIN name should use a SDTM-specified standard domain name and prefixes where applicable

Outcome.Message: DOMAIN Code is not a published DOMAIN Code in CDISC Controlled Terminology, confirm if domain is a custom domain

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Using SDTM-specified standard domain names and prefixes where applicable.
